remarks: Transfer existential uniqueness from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2004.)
statement:
euxfr.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
euxfr.2 $e |- E! y x = A $.
euxfr.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
euxfr $p |- ( E! x ph <-> E! y ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
